body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is John Long and the customer's name is Jane Hughes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is John Long, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi John, my name is Jane Hughes. I'm looking to buy a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Jane! We have an exciting selection of motorcycles. May I ask, what type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not sure yet, but I want something reliable and good for both commuting and weekend rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds perfect! We have several models that would fit your needs. Now, could I please have your email address to send you some options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide your phone number for further assistance?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's three zero three, five one two, eight nine one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you very much! I will send you an email shortly with some motorcycles that fit your criteria.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sounds good, I appreciate your help, John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jane! Thank you for your time today. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
